basics.name: Joshua Chow
basics.label: Computer Engineering Student
basics.summary: I am pursing my B.S. in Computer Engineering under the College of Engineering at the University of Hawaii at Manoa. I expect to graduate in Spring 2027.

work.summary: Provided mentorship to high school students towards application of electronics and aerospace
highlights: Worked closely with high school students on developing electronics for their project for UH Manoa
Research basic rocket trajectory and orbits
Learned the ServiceNow framework to automate/manage businesses
Built networking knowledge base and access point utilization through courses

work.company: Information Technology Services at UH Manoa
highlights: Running fiber optic/ethernet patches through the Information Technologies Data Center
Manage and resolve Cherwell tickets from different departments within the Infomration Technology Center and on campus

volunteer.organization: Center for Renewable Energy and Island Sustainability
volunteer.summary: Lead developer for weather sensing project
highlights: Design firmware for distributed weather sensor network
Maintain custom data collection and storage infrastructure
Webmaster/IT Officer, IEEE Student Branch, UH Manoa, 2012-2013
